Reward-based Crowdfunding for Female Entrepreneurs

Empowering Businesses Empowering Communities Empowering Her

KPesa aims to empower female entrepreneurs operating in micro, small and medium enterprises by providing a platform to access finance through reward-based crowdfunding and build a community of entrepreneurs and supporters.


  • Launch your crowdfunding campaign

    Give your business a platform by launching a crowdfunding campaign on KPesa.

  • Engage supporters through rewards

    Drive engagement by offering rewards to donors and supporters.

  • Build connections in the community

    Grow your knowledge and your network in our community forum.

Growing a Community to Empower Female Entrepreneurs Everywhere
